title: Maokai
body:
One thing I've noticed is that {{champion:57}} seems to be the only *"supertank"* that can actually survive anti-tank strategies; items like {{item:3153}} and champion picks like {{champion:96}}.
So OP come mid to late game.

A supertank that can be untargetable, GG.

replies.body: The untargetable isn't what makes him strong, what makes him strong is mass amounts of CC and an ult that reduces damage to everyone around you, and converts it into damage.

All valid points. However the untargetability of Maokai during twisted advance is just one aspect of his kit that if used well makes him deceptively tanky or unkillable for the early levels of a match. 
It wasn't my intent to say that his untargetability is the only reason that he's picked.
Malphite does have pretty hard engage. But unlike Maokai, the disruptiveness he makes needs his ult.
